I am currently teaching a coding class to grade 8 students. The focus is on introducing students to some basic coding principles using Python. The Pycharm, and independent development environment for Python, has recently created a education edition. I am experimenting with creating lessons and tasks using this IDE and you will find github links to all my lessons here. I'd love to hear feedback and suggestions, as they are works in progress.

  • Unit 1

    (Github Link)
    Types & Variables

    Students will become familiar with data types (strings, integers, floats, booleans), variables, and basic input/output.

  • Unit 2

    Branching

    Coming soon!

  • Unit 3

    For Loops

    Coming soon!

  • Unit 4

    Lists & Dictionaries

    Coming soon!
